name: Drugs, Drug Proprietors, and Druggists Sundries
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Wholesale distributors of prescription and proprietary drugs,
vitamins, toiletries, antiseptics, bandages, pharmaceuticals,
biological or related products, and other miscellaneous small articles
typically for sale in drug stores.
For wholesale distributors of surgical, hospital, or dental supplies, use
MCC 5047.
